GeneDef.label: Xenodominant
GeneDef.description: The presence of the gene rearranges the water-salt balance, increasing the need and need for the second, while reducing the amount of salt received with food, which forces the carrier to consume salt in its pure form.

GeneDef.label: Poison glands
GeneDef.description: The presence of the gene develops poison glands in the host, which allow them to send poison during attacks.

GeneDef.label: Season hair color
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene change their hair color according to the season on the map.
